main.name: Rakesh
main.description: I am also know Core Java.
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rakesh! You might also know me raky. I am a self taught Web Developer. I have good knowledge of Html, Css, JavaScript and Bootstrap. Creating design layouts and UI is something I enjoy. I have not done any internship in web Development so far but I like to keep trying things on my own like creating Web Application for different scenarios and dummy projects for different organisations etc. You can see my projects on Github or work section.I wish to explore my strength and weaknesses and learn more about Web Development under a highly professional team. I assure that I will give my best if I get hired for your organisation.I want to be a full stack devloper this is my goal and I am sure you will help me.Thank you for your Attention
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of Web Developer Community!

training.title: Core Java (OOPS Programmer)
training.description: I learn Core Java to gain more knowledge and enhance my skill to understanding how Object-Oriented Programming works .

testimonials.text: Your contibution of our sorting algo project to develope frontend I am very pleased with your work so far, You are just Amazing.
Many thanks for all your help with the design of food card - it was much appreciated and I am very happy with it.
Thanks again for the work you have done, it looks fantastic thank you! I do really appreciate it.
Website without visitors is like a ship lost in the horizon.
